item.title: [EN] SSH Server Configuration
item.description: Hi everyone, in this article, I will show you how to configure an SSH server in detail. SSH (Secure Shell Protocol) is a widely-used protocol that securely connects and manages remote servers. In this tutorial, you will learn how to set up and configure an SSH server from scratch. To set up an SSH server, you need to install the openssh-server package on the server and the openssh-client package on the client.
